title: Go Tell It on the Mountain - details of sound

content.question: The attention the speaker pays to the details of sound serves primarily to

choices.label: distract the reader from the disconcerting issues raised in the passage
offer the reader a physical sense of the church service
entertain the reader prior to the presentation of more challenging material
complement the attention paid to the visual and the tactile

content.answer: offer the reader a physical sense of the church service

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify and describe specific textual details that convey or reveal a setting.
